query.statement: insert into USERS ( USER_ID, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, SSN, SL_YN, BIRTH_DAY, AGE, CELL_PHONE, ADDR, EMAIL, EMAIL_YN, IMAGE_FILE, REG_DATE ) values ( :vo.userId, :vo.userName, :vo.password, :vo.ssn, :vo.slYn, :vo.birthDay, :vo.age, :vo.cellPhone, :vo.addr, :vo.email, :vo.emailYn, :vo.imageFile, :vo.regDate )

update USERS SET USER_NAME= :vo.userName, PASSWORD= :vo.password, SSN= :vo.ssn, SL_YN= :vo.slYn, BIRTH_DAY= :vo.birthDay, AGE= :vo.age, CELL_PHONE= :vo.cellPhone, ADDR= :vo.addr, EMAIL= :vo.email, EMAIL_YN= :vo.emailYn, IMAGE_FILE= :vo.imageFile, REG_DATE= :vo.regDate where USER_ID= :vo.userId
select USER_ID, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, SSN, SL_YN, BIRTH_DAY, AGE, CELL_PHONE, ADDR, EMAIL, EMAIL_YN, IMAGE_FILE, REG_DATE from USERS where USER_ID = :vo.userId
select USER_ID, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, SSN, SL_YN, BIRTH_DAY, AGE, CELL_PHONE, ADDR, EMAIL, EMAIL_YN, IMAGE_FILE, REG_DATE from USERS
